1. Weigh out 40.0 g of Gd2O3 using an analytical balance. 
 2. Weigh 20.0 g of HgO accurately. 
 3. Weigh 30.0 g of Tb4O7. 
 4. Combine all three powders in a clean ceramic or glass mixing bowl.
